messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] DO NOT OPEN ATTACHMENT! boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0009_01C0C8C2.0DAE20E0"
messages.msgSnippet: I have received this virus - very clever, and very quick to replicate and spread like wild-fire!  At first, it just says the attachment won t open due to a
messages.messageBody: I have received this virus - very clever, and very quick to replicate and spread like wild-fire!  At first, it just says the attachment won't open due to a corrupted file, then after a while, the fun begins!  I OK now, but DO NOT OPEN ANY ATTACHMENTS with strangely worded titles!!

messages.subject: DO NOT OPEN ATTACHMENT!
messages.msgSnippet: Pont open anything with attachments I think I got a virus. everything i get in as mail cone thriugh my outbox, an attachment is andded and the int come in my
messages.messageBody:
Pont open anything with attachments I think I got a virus. everything i get in as mail cone thriugh my outbox, an attachment is andded and the int come in my inbox like I sent it DO NOT OPEN ANY ATTACHEMENTS
Johanna
Life is the ultimate learning experience!

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] DO NOT OPEN ATTACHMENT! boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0009_01C0C8C2.0DAE20E0"
messages.msgSnippet: ... Our internet service provider filters all our email for viruses BEFORE sending it to our inbox.  They always notify us if something had a virus in it so we
messages.messageBody:
> Pont open anything with attachments I think I got a virus. everything i get in as mail cone thriugh my outbox, an attachment is andded and the int come in my inbox like I sent it DO NOT OPEN ANY ATTACHEMENTS
> Johanna
> Life is the ultimate learning experience!
>

Our internet service provider filters all our email for viruses
BEFORE sending it to our inbox. They always notify us if
something had a virus in it so we could notify the person. I have
not received notification that anything you have send had a virus,
so I think you are OK.

Judie
